name: TrumpSays
0:
”Alexa, open Trump Says”
”Alexa, start Trump Says”
”Alexa, ask Trump Says to start a game”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trump says
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Test your knowledge of the most entertaining quotes by Donald Trump, Joe Biden, and other leaders. "Trump Says" will give you a quote from a U.S. politician and you get to decide if it was said by Donald Trump or not. You won't believe some of the strange, funny, and flat out entertaining things that our President and other leaders have said. Good luck!!

To start, just say "Alexa, open Trump Says" or "Alexa, start Trump Says". You can also say "Alexa, ask Trump Says to start a game."

For quote references and other skills by The Crowded Kitchen, please visit thecrowdedkitchenblogs.wordpress.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
